siteMetadata.title: Eden Adler's Personal Blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: I'm a Software Engineer working at a startup in Tel Aviv. I'm a challenge seeker, self starter, and creative thinker.

frontmatter.title: From Zero to Deploy: how I created a static website from scratch using Netlify + Gatsby
frontmatter.description: After my first year working as a frontend web developer, I got the idea to have my own personal site. It’d be a platform to showcase my work, share content, and serve as a creative outlet for me outside of work. Here, I’ll walk you through my experience building the site from zero to deploy.

frontmatter.title: Humane Typography in the Digital Age
frontmatter.description: An Essay on Typography by Eric Gill takes the reader back to the year 1930. The year when a conflict between two worlds came to its term. The machines of the industrial world finally took over the handicrafts.
